docs.summary: Manage redirection of users between Wix Headless client sites and Wix-managed pages.

params.name: callbacks
params.doc:
Details of pages to redirect the visitor back to on the Wix Headless client site.

 **Note**: For an authentication redirect, don't pass a post-flow URL here. Instead, pass one in `auth.authRequest.redirectUri`.

params.name: preferences
params.doc: Optional preferences for customizing redirection to Wix pages.

docs.summary:
Creates a URL for redirecting a visitor from an external client site to a Wix page for Wix-managed functionality. 


The Create Redirect Session endpoint enables your external Wix Headless client site, built on any platform, to integrate Wix-managed frontend functionality for specific processes.
For example, your site can temporarily redirect a visitor to Wix for authentication, or for a checkout process for a bookings, eCommerce, events, or paid plans transaction.

To initiate a redirect session:

1. Call Create Redirect Session with the details required for Wix to take care of one specific process (for example, authentication or a bookings checkout). Provide one or more callback URLs, so Wix can redirect the user back to your site as appropriate when the process is over.
1. Redirect your visitor to the URL provided in the response. This URL includes query parameters informing Wix where to redirect the visitor back to on your external site.
1. Make sure the pages at the callback URLs you provided take care of the next stages in your visitor flow.

examples.title: Create a redirect session for an eCommerce checkout

params.name: callbacks
params.doc:
Details of pages to redirect the visitor back to on the Wix Headless client site.

 **Note**: For an authentication redirect, don't pass a post-flow URL here. Instead, pass one in `auth.authRequest.redirectUri`.

params.name: preferences
params.doc: Optional preferences for customizing redirection to Wix pages.

docs.summary:
Creates a URL for redirecting a visitor from an external client site to a Wix page for Wix-managed functionality. 


The Create Redirect Session endpoint enables your external Wix Headless client site, built on any platform, to integrate Wix-managed frontend functionality for specific processes.
For example, your site can temporarily redirect a visitor to Wix for authentication, or for a checkout process for a bookings, eCommerce, events, or paid plans transaction.

To initiate a redirect session:

1. Call Create Redirect Session with the details required for Wix to take care of one specific process (for example, authentication or a bookings checkout). Provide one or more callback URLs, so Wix can redirect the user back to your site as appropriate when the process is over.
1. Redirect your visitor to the URL provided in the response. This URL includes query parameters informing Wix where to redirect the visitor back to on your external site.
1. Make sure the pages at the callback URLs you provided take care of the next stages in your visitor flow.

examples.title: Create a redirect session for an eCommerce checkout

messages.name: _wix_headless_v1_RedirectSessionCreatedDomainEvent
messages.displayName: Redirect Session Created Domain Event Object

members.name: id
members.doc: Unique event ID.

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Expected `wix.headless.v1.redirect_session`.
Fully Qualified Domain Name.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
Expected `created`.
Event name.

members.name: createdEvent
members.doc: Event Info

members.name: entityId
members.doc: RedirectSession ID associated with this event.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

messages.name: _wix_headless_v1_RedirectSessionEntityCreatedEvent
messages.displayName: Redirect Session Entity Created Event Object

members.name: entity
members.doc: Event body

members.name: slot
members.doc:
The slot for the corresponding session, when the session is either a single session 
 or a specific session generated from a recurring session.

members.name: bookable
members.doc:
Whether the slot is bookable. Bookability is determined by checking a 
 session's open slots and booking policies. Locks are not taken into
 account.

members.name: totalSpots
members.doc:
Total number of spots for this slot.
 For example, if a session has a total of 10 spots and 3 spots are booked, 
 `spotsTotal` is 10 and `openSpots` is 7.

members.name: openSpots
members.doc: Number of open spots for this slot.

members.name: waitingList
members.doc: An object describing the slot's waitlist and its occupancy.

members.name: bookingPolicyViolations
members.doc: Booking policy violations for the slot.

members.name: locked
members.doc:
Indicates whether the slot is locked because a waitlist exists. 
When a slot frees up, the slot is offered to the next customer on the waitlist. Read-only.

members.name: sessionId
members.doc:
ID for the slot's corresponding session, when the session is either a single session 
 or a specific session generated from a recurring session.

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: Service ID.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Schedule ID.

members.name: startDate
members.doc:
The start time of this slot in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339)
 format.

 If `timezone` is specified,
 dates are based on the local date/time. This means that the timezone offset
 in the `start_date` is ignored.

members.name: endDate
members.doc:
The end time of this slot in
 [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339) format.

 If `timezone` is specified,
 dates are based on the local date/time. This means that the timezone offset
 in the `end_date` is ignored.

members.name: timezone
members.doc:
The timezone for which slot availability is to be calculated.

 Learn more about [handling Daylight Savings Time (DST) for local time zones](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-bookings/availability-calendar/query-availability#wix-bookings_availability-calendar_query-availability_handling-daylight-savings-time-dst-for-local-time-zones) 
 when calculating availability.

members.name: resource
members.doc:
The resource required for this slot. Currently, the only supported resource
 is the relevant staff member for the slot.

members.name: location
members.doc: Geographic location of the slot.

members.name: id
members.doc: Resource ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Resource name. Read only.

members.name: id
members.doc:
Business location ID. Available only for locations that are business locations, 
 meaning the `location_type` is `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`.

members.name: name
members.doc: Location name.

members.name: formattedAddress
members.doc: The full address of this location.

members.name: locationType
members.doc:
Location type.
 
 - `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`: The business address, as set in the siteâ€™s general settings.
 - `"OWNER_CUSTOM"`: The address as set when creating the service.
 - `"CUSTOM"`: The address as set for the individual session.

members.name: totalSpots
members.doc:
Total number of spots and open spots for this waitlist.
 For example, a Yoga class with 10 waitlist spots and 3 registered 
 on the waitlist has 10 `total_spots` and 7 `open_spots`.

members.name: openSpots
members.doc: Number of open spots for this waitlist.

members.name: tooEarlyToBook
members.doc: Bookings policy violation. Too early to book this slot.

members.name: tooLateToBook
members.doc: Bookings policy violation. Too late to book this slot.

members.name: bookOnlineDisabled
members.doc: Bookings policy violation. Online booking is disabled for this slot.

docs.summary:
AuthorizeRequest is sent by the client to the authorization server to initiate
 the authorization process.

members.name: clientId
members.doc: ID of the Wix OAuth app requesting authorization.

members.name: responseType
members.doc:
Desired authorization [grant type](https://auth0.com/docs/authenticate/protocols/oauth#grant-types).

Supported values:
+ `code`: The endpoint returns an authorization code that can be used to obtain an access token.

members.name: redirectUri
members.doc: URI to redirect the browser to after authentication and authorization. The browser is redirected to this URI whether the authentication and authorization process is successful or not.

members.name: scope
members.doc:
Desired scope of access. If this field is left empty, only an access token is granted. 
 To received a refresh token, pass `offline_access` as the value of this field.

members.name: state
members.doc:
A value used to confirm the state of an application before and after it makes an authorization
 request. If a value for this field is set in the request, it's added to the `redirectUri` when the browser
 is redirected there.  
 Learn more about [using the state parameter](https://auth0.com/docs/secure/attack-protection/state-parameters).

members.name: responseMode
members.doc:
Desired response format.

Supported values:
+ `query`: The response parameters are encoded as query string parameters and added to the `redirectUri` when redirecting.
+ `fragment`: The response parameters are encoded as URI fragment parameters and added to the `redirectUri` when redirecting.
+ `web_message`: The response parameters are encoded as a JSON object and added to the body of a [web message response](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/draft-sakimura-oauth-wmrm-00). 

Default value: `query`

members.name: codeChallenge
members.doc:
Code challenge to use for PKCE verification.
 This field is only used if `responseType` is set to `code`.

members.name: codeChallengeMethod
members.doc:
Code challenge method to use for PKCE verification. 
This field is only used if `responseType` is set to `code`.

Supported values:
+ `S256`: The code challenge is transformed using SHA-256 encyption.
+ `S512`: The code challenge is transformed using SHA-512 encyption.

members.name: sessionToken
members.doc: Session token of the site visitor to authorize.

docs.summary:
*
Information for redirecting a visitor from an external Wix Headless client site to a Wix page for Wix-managed functionality.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the redirect session created.

members.name: fullUrl
members.doc: The full URL of the Wix page to redirect the visitor to. This URL includes query parameters informing Wix where to redirect the visitor back to on the Wix Headless client site.

members.name: thankYouPageUrl
members.doc:
The URL for a custom thank you page implemented on a site outside of Wix. The visitor is directed to this page after the Wix-managed process is completed.
 If the process is abandoned or interrupted, the visitor is redirected to the URL specified in `postFlowUrl` instead.

 Default: If you don't pass a URL, the visitor is redirected to a Wix thank you page, and from there to the URL specified in `postFlowUrl`.

members.name: postFlowUrl
members.doc:
The URL Wix should redirect the visitor to when the Wix-managed process is completed, abandoned, or interrupted.

 **Note**: For an authentication redirect, don't pass a URL here. Instead, pass one in `auth.authRequest.redirectUri`.

members.name: loginUrl
members.doc:
The URL for a custom login page implemented outside of Wix.

 Default: If you don't pass a URL, a Wix login page is used.

members.name: bookingsServiceListUrl
members.doc:
The URL for a custom bookings services page implemented outside of Wix.

 Default: If you don't pass a URL, a Wix bookings services page is used.

members.name: cartPageUrl
members.doc:
The URL for a custom eCommerce cart page implemented outside of Wix.

 Default: If you don't pass a URL, a Wix cart page is used.

members.name: planListUrl
members.doc:
The URL for a custom pricing plans page implemented outside of Wix.

 Default: If you don't pass a URL, a Wix pricing plans page is used.

messages.name: _wix_headless_v1_RedirectSessionBookingsCheckoutParams
messages.displayName: Redirect Session Bookings Checkout Params Object

members.name: timezone
members.doc:
The timezone to use when presenting the selected slot to users, in [tz database](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones) format. For example, `America/Santiago`.

 Default: If you don't specify a timezone, the timezone in `slotAvailability.slot.timezone` is used.

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: **Required.** ID of the service for which to select the slot. Use [Query Services](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-bookings/services-v2/query-services) to obtain a service ID.

members.name: slotAvailability
members.doc: **Required.** The calendar slot to check out.

members.name: auth
members.doc: (Required) The authorization request to be sent to the authorization server

members.name: authRequest
members.doc: **Required.** The authorization request to send to the authorization server.

messages.name: _wix_headless_v1_RedirectSessionEcomCheckoutParams
messages.displayName: Redirect Session Ecom Checkout Params Object

members.name: checkoutId
members.doc: **Required.** ID of the checkout to process. Use [Create Checkout From Cart](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-ecommerce/cart/create-checkout-from-cart) to create a checkout and obtain an ID.

messages.name: _wix_headless_v1_RedirectSessionPaidPlansCheckoutParams
messages.displayName: Redirect Session Paid Plans Checkout Params Object

members.name: planId
members.doc: **Required.** ID of the paid plan selected. Use [Query Public Plans](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-pricing-plans/pricing-plans/plans/query-public-plans) to obtain a paid plan ID.

members.name: checkoutData
members.doc:
For use when pricing plan selection is part of a checkout flow, only if the paid plan selection page is implemented on an external Wix Headless client site.
 In this case, a string is received by the external pricing plans page as a `checkoutData` query parameter. Pass this string back here when redirecting back to Wix for checkout.

messages.name: _wix_headless_v1_RedirectSessionEventsCheckoutParams
messages.displayName: Redirect Session Events Checkout Params Object

members.name: reservationId
members.doc: **Required.** ID of the temporary event reservation. Use [Create Reservation](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/checkout/create-reservation) to reserve a ticket temporarily and obtain a reservation ID.

members.name: eventSlug
members.doc: **Required.** URL-friendly event slug, generated from the event title of the event. For example, `my-event-4`. Use [Query Events](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/event/query-events) to obtain an event slug.

messages.name: _wix_headless_v1_RedirectSessionMembersAccountParams
messages.displayName: Redirect Session Members Account Params Object

members.name: section
members.doc:
The member account page to redirect to.

 Default: `ACCOUNT_INFO`

members.name: clientId
members.doc: **Required.** ID of the OAuth app authorizing the client.

members.name: accountPagePath
members.doc: Path of the account page in the site's members area. Required if `useGenericWixPages` is `false` and the account page path has been changed in the Wix editor.

members.name: profilePagePath
members.doc: Path of the member profile page in the site's members area. Required if `useGenericWixPages` is `false` and the member profile page path has been changed in the Wix editor.

members.name: useGenericWixPages
members.doc:
Whether to use a standard Wix template for Wix-managed pages the visitor is redirected to. Set to `false` only if your client site connects with a Wix site that has custom pages.

 Default: `true`

members.name: callbacks
members.doc:
Details of pages to redirect the visitor back to on the Wix Headless client site.

 **Note**: For an authentication redirect, don't pass a post-flow URL here. Instead, pass one in `auth.authRequest.redirectUri`.

members.name: preferences
members.doc: Optional preferences for customizing redirection to Wix pages.

members.name: bookingsCheckout
members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL for a Wix Bookings checkout.

members.name: ecomCheckout
members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL for a Wix eCommerce checkout.

members.name: eventsCheckout
members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL for a Wix Events checkout.

members.name: paidPlansCheckout
members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL for a Wix Paid Plans checkout.

members.name: login
members.doc: Pass an empty object in this parameter to generate a URL for Wix login without first checking whether the visitor is authenticated.

members.name: logout
members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL to log out from a Wix account. This process invalidates the visitor or member token and clears cookies associated with the Wix domain from their browser.

members.name: auth
members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL for Wix authentication.

members.name: redirectSession
members.doc: Details for redirecting the visitor to a Wix page.

members.name: clientId
members.doc: The oauth app id used in order to pull the allowed domains from, has to correspond to the same metasite as the site in context

members.name: redirectSession
members.doc: The Wix URL details to redirect into

members.name: callbackUrl
members.doc: An external URL to validate

members.name: callbackType
members.doc: The type of the callback URL

members.name: clientId
members.doc: The oauth app id used in order to pull the allowed domains from, has to correspond to the same metasite as the site in context

members.name: isValid
members.doc: is the provided url allowed for the given client id

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • OWNER_BUSINESS
  • OWNER_CUSTOM
  • CUSTOM

Possible values are:
  • ACCOUNT_INFO - default - account info section in "my account"
  • BOOKINGS - My Bookings section in "my account"
  • ORDERS - My Orders section in "my account"
  • SUBSCRIPTIONS - Subscriptions section in "my account"
  • EVENTS - Events section in "my account"

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN - Invalid value - default
  • LOGOUT - The callback URL is used for the logout flow
  • CHECKOUT - The callback URL is used for a checkout flow
  • AUTHORIZE - The callback URL is used for the authorize flow
